name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Cook on a hot skillet until golden brown on both sides. Serve with syrup or fruits.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs and pour into skillet. Add cheese and spinach. Cook until done.

name: French Toast
instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture. Cook on skillet until golden. Serve with syrup.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Prepare sauce with beef and vegetables. Combine and serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread, add cheese, grill until golden brown.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss all ingredients together and serve chilled.

name: Grilled Chicken
instructions: Season chicken and grill until cooked. Serve with vegetables or rice.

name: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry beef and vegetables in a hot pan with sauce. Serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Cook vegetables in curry paste and coconut milk. Serve with rice.

name: Chicken Tacos
instructions: Cook chicken with spices. Fill taco shells with chicken and toppings. Serve immediately.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Cook tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Add broth, simmer, blend, and finish with cream.
